name: HellHole (elGabe)
description:
Hell Hole is a short, blood-pumping game about fighting demons in hell with your soul. 

Your soul can be controlled to destroy spawns of Satan, but your body won't be able to move while you use it. 

  • 66.6 seconds of pure carnage. I don't want to waste your time.
  • Tight, deliciously sinful controls.
  • Old and damaged look.
